name: Memento (itch)
description:
Memento is a 2D platform-based Metroidvania,

The game sees the player exploring the past and present versions of the world by travelling through memories and unlocking new abilities that'll help them navigate the space. 

Update: Changed a sound effect due to copyright (Can't upload files during votes so the link to the current version is below)  http://www.mediafire.com/file/uvp2j226773aopn/Memento.rar/file
